Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 64th overall pick, by Northeastern in 1979...
Injured on 5/9/1980 with a Torn Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Injured on 4/18/1981 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Injured on 5/14/1981 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/1981 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1981 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/10/1985 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/4/1987 with a Broken Jaw, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/1987 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1989, off Wilson Melgoza (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/11/1989, off Jon Gilland (TOL)...
Traded from Northeastern to Boston (UBA) on 7/20/1989 (Going to PIL: 1B R. Cameron, CF C. Acosta. Going to NE: P J. Moon, P J. Dunbar, P A. Kidwell)...
